headline: Show HN: DataGridXL v2, fastest Excel-like JavaScript Data Grid
description:
Hello HN,

I'm Robbert, after 1,5 years of hard work I have just released DataGridXL version 2.

DataGridXL is the world's fastest Excel-like Data Grid. It's written in JavaScript ES6 and made in the 2020s. It weighs less than 250kb and it has zero dependencies.

My goal for DataGridXL is to be the most performant, reliable and user-friendly spreadsheet-like data table. It has its own virtual DOM to keep scrolling & editing fast and to prevent DOM errors.

New features since version 1:

- Multi-Range Selection

- Freeze and Unfreeze rows & columns

- Hide and Show rows & columns

- Rapidly search cells

- Fullscreen Mode

- Works with Touch (new bottom bar enables editing data on touch devices)

- Dark Theme

- Quick Column Sorting

Please have a look at the homepage https://www.datagridxl.com/ and star DataGridXL2 on Github: https://github.com/DataGridXL/DataGridXL2.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: DataGridXL v2，最快的类似Excel的JavaScript数据网格
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: DataGridXL v2，最快的類似Excel的JavaScript數據網格
description_zh-Hans:
你好，HN，

我是Robbert，经过1.5年的努力，我刚刚发布了DataGridXL的第2版。

DataGridXL是世界上最快的类似Excel的数据网格。它是用JavaScript ES6编写的，在2020年制造。它的重量不到250kb，而且它的依赖性为零。

我对DataGridXL的目标是成为性能最强、最可靠、用户最友好的电子表格式的数据表。It has its own virtual DOM to keep scrolling & editing fast and to prevent DOM errors.

New features since version 1:

- Multi-Range Selection

- Freeze and Unfreeze rows & columns

- Hide and Show rows & columns

- Rapidly search cells

- Fullscreen Mode

- Works with Touch (new bottom bar enables editing data on touch devices)

- Dark Theme

- Quick Column Sorting

Please have a look at the homepage https://www.datagridxl.com/ and star DataGridXL2 on Github: https://github.com/DataGridXL/DataGridXL2.
description_zh-Hant:
你好，HN，

我是Robbert，經過1.5年的努力，我剛剛發佈了DataGridXL的第2版。

DataGridXL是世界上最快的類似Excel的數據網格。它是用JavaScript ES6編寫的，在2020年製造。它的重量不到250kb，而且它的依賴性為零。

我對DataGridXL的目標是成為性能最強、最可靠、用戶最友好的電子表格式的數據表。It has its own virtual DOM to keep scrolling & editing fast and to prevent DOM errors.

New features since version 1:

- Multi-Range Selection

- Freeze and Unfreeze rows & columns

- Hide and Show rows & columns

- Rapidly search cells

- Fullscreen Mode

- Works with Touch (new bottom bar enables editing data on touch devices)

- Dark Theme

- Quick Column Sorting

Please have a look at the homepage https://www.datagridxl.com/ and star DataGridXL2 on Github: https://github.com/DataGridXL/DataGridXL2.
